description: The department requires temporary help services for a Technologist, Electrical and Electronics Engineering.
duration_in_months: Our unrestricted view is that the required duration is 12 months.
full_summary:
### NPP - S#4450084: Temporary Personnel Services - Department of National Defense

#### Contract Details

* **Solicitation Number:** S4450084
* **Reference Number:** CB-5586-52120428
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** 2023-05-16
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-18T15:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-05-29
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-04-26

#### Tender Status

This tender is now expired.

#### Contract Title

The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Personnel Services. This requirement is open only to those arrangement holders who have qualified under the following streams and categories:

* Stream 3.6 - Technologist, Electrical and Electronics Engineering

The selected arrangement holders are:

* 7792395 Canada Inc.
* Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
* Adecco Employment Services Limited/Services de placement Adecco Limited
* Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
* Excel Human Resources Inc.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* Lionel Drouin
* Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
* Olav Consulting Corp
* Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
* Quallium Corporation
* TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
* TECHNOLOGIES CYSCA INC. / CYSCA TECHNOLOGIES INC.
* TECSIS Corporation
* The AIM Group Inc.

#### Selection Criteria

The lowest price will be the determining factor in the selection process.

#### Level of Security Required

A minimum level of security clearance of FSC Secret is required for resources involved in this project.

#### Trade Agreements

This Request for Proposal is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defense
* **Address:** 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1
* **Email:** CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (613) 971-7955

#### Resources

For more information and to view the tender notice, please visit the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.can
